testCase.name: DeleteModal component renders correctly when deletingPost is provided
DeleteModal component calls handleDeletePost with post id when "Eliminar" button is clicked
DeleteModal component calls closeDeleteModal when "Cancelar" button is clicked
Menu component renders menu items correctly
Posts component renders loading indicator while fetching data
EditModal component renders correctly when editingPost is provided
EditModal component calls handleUpdatePost with updated post data when "Guardar Cambios" button is clicked
EditModal component calls closeEditModal when "Cancelar" button is clicked
Post component renders the correct number of posts
renders Home component when "/" path is matched
Home component adds slide-up animation on button click
